verses.name: Luke 9:19
verses.text: They answering said, John the Baptist; but some say, Elias; and others say, that one of the old prophets is risen again.

verses.name: Luke 9:20
verses.text: He said unto them, But whom say ye that I am? Peter answering said, The Christ of God.

verses.name: Luke 9:21
verses.text: And he straitly charged them, and commanded them to tell no man that thing;

verses.name: Luke 9:22
verses.text: Saying, The Son of man must suffer many things, and be rejected of the elders and chief priests and scribes, and be slain, and be raised the third day.
